mapper.select:
SELECT r.item_name, l.waybill_number, r.RES_SE_NAME, l.PROCESS_TIME, l.DELIVERY_STEP FROM test t INNER JOIN cap_delivery_reservation r ON t.reservation = r.res_number INNER JOIN cap_delivery_list l ON t.waybill = l.waybill_number WHERE l.PROCESS_TIME IN (SELECT MAX(process_time) FROM cap_delivery_list GROUP BY WAYBILL_NUMBER) AND #{loginName} IN (r.res_se_name,r.res_re_name) AND #{phone} IN (r.res_se_phone,r.res_se_phone2,r.res_re_phone,r.res_re_phone2)
AND process_time >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND process_time < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY l.PROCESS_TIME
